content.text: I highly recommend Gisselle to any high-performing UX design team. I've worked with Gisselle on several projects and have been blown away by her creativity and attention to detail. She is able to design intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that meet the needs of both the user and the business. Gisselle is a strategic problem-solver and an all-around team player. She has a great understanding of user experience best practices and is always willing to collaborate with others. I wouldn't hesitate to work with Gisselle again in the future and I can't recommend her enough.

author.name: Jose Sanjuan
author.position: Content Design Manager at Walmart Global Tech

content.text: Gisselle brings exceptional design thinking and user-centered approach to every project. Her ability to translate complex business requirements into elegant, intuitive designs is remarkable. She consistently delivers high-quality work while maintaining excellent collaboration with cross-functional teams.

author.name: Sarah Johnson
author.position: Senior Product Manager at MGM Resorts

content.text: Working with Gisselle has been an absolute pleasure. Her design expertise, combined with her strategic mindset, makes her an invaluable team member. She has a unique ability to balance user needs with business objectives, resulting in designs that are both beautiful and functional.

author.name: Michael Chen
author.position: Lead Developer at Tech Innovations Inc
